name: AI Infinite
description:
AI Infinite is 2d sandbox space game where you can build any ship you want only limitation is your imagination, resources and parts that you researched. To get resouces you can either fight or mine or build colonies. If you decide to fight for resources you have to build ship that will be either fast and long ranged or heavy armored and equipped with close range lasers. When you finish collecting resources you can accept a race or cargo delivery quest and when you are finished you can find yourself a pretty planet and colonize it.

Features
  • Fully implemented ship customization
  • Enemies
  • Bases and enemy bases
  • Planets and colonization
  • Ship part research system
  • Abilities
  • Keybindings, options and full gamepad support

And much more...

Recomendation

If you're running windows 8 I recommend to turn on "Disable Display Scaling On High DPI Settings" under compatibility settings
